ygData.subject: Deja Vu all over again.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine looks toward Striker, Let me handle this Striker he yells. He opens a direct link to the other wolf so Rush doesn t overhear we ve already been

Lunarpine looks toward Striker, "Let me handle this Striker" he 
yells. He opens a direct link to the other wolf so Rush doesn't 
overhear "we've already been through this scenario and it resulted in 
a bomb delivered to our front door. Trust me I Know Wing and I can 
get her out of this functional. Trust your instincts, and trust me, A 
pack must be confident with each others abilities."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker/Ramulus/Brix/Fliq/DeathScythe::
> 
> Striker jumps away from the bomb as it explodes, about to fire 
again on the 
> attackers when he sees Rush take Shadow Wing into his mouth. He 
holds his 
> fire, growling. Striker's jetpack raises him into the air, the 
Maximal 
> looking at Rush. He wished Ramulus were here, the ram was much 
better at 
> negotiation than him.
> 
> "Allright, let her go and you can go peacefully," he says to Rush 
and the 
> others, "If you kill her, we'll be forced to attack you."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus, Brix, and Fliq stop as something flies overhead, their 
scanners 
> picking up a non-Maximal signature. Ramulus frowns.
> 
> "Can you guys get these pods back to the Ark?" he asks Brix and 
Fliq, the 
> other two nodding.
> 
> "Allright," Ramulus says, transforming into his beast mode, "I'll 
see you 
> back at base."
> 
> He gallops into the fores, following the flying bot (DeathScythe). 
Brix and 
> Fliq continue on toward the Ark.
